channel.title: Epic Snowball Fight
channel.description:
Here is the article:
[url=http://news.aol.com/article/ready-to-rumble-dorms-prepare-for-epic/315099?cid=46]http://news.aol.com/article/ready-to-rumble-dorms-prepare-for-epic/315099?cid=46[/url]
I actually found it quite funny, how the police and everything had to come. Plus the fact I am about 2 hours from Madison, Wisconsin. I wish I would of been there at that time XD.
Great new section by the way :D
